name: Control Group (ChazBurgerz)
description:
Made in 3 days for Wowie! Jam 4.0.

A short puzzle game in which you test the latest AI product from Todog Robotics. Test and work with the AI while completing a series of puzzles. As you move the AI more, it trains the AI to move like you would, and while useful it can sometimes be detrimental to your efforts... 

CONTROLS:

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - CLICK UI ELEMENTS

WASD or ARROW KEYS - MOVE

SPACEBAR - SWITCH BETWEEN CONTROL MODE AND AI MODE

R or ESCAPE - RESET LEVEL
